# queryTimestampFrequency()

**Instance Method**

Queries the frequency of the GPU timestamp in ticks per second.

## Declaration

```swift
func queryTimestampFrequency() -> UInt64
```

## Return Value

The frequency of the GPU timestamp in ticks per second.
